channel.title: Server changer help for a renamed client

item.title: Server changer help for a renamed client
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

im pretty sure i added everything correctly for the server switcher but i cant hit enter or click next to serer ip: to type it in
heres what i have

else if(loginScreenCursorPos == 2){ if(l1 == 8 && server.length() > 0) server = server.substring(0, server.length() - 1); if(l1 == 9 || l1 == 10 || l1 == 13) loginScreenCursorPos = 0; if(flag1) server += (char) l1; // if(server.length() > 12) // server = server.substring(0, 12); }

chatTextDrawingArea.method389(true, c / 2 - 86, 0xffffff, "Server IP: " + server + ((loginScreenCursorPos == 3) & (loopCycle % 40 < 20) ? "@yel@|" : ""), j); j += 15;

if your smart enough you know to add the strings
i know how to get it to call the ip when you log on also
but the main problem is is that you are not able to click or hit enter to get to the ip

Read full topic
item.source: Server changer help for a renamed client
